verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are the only One I need.
I bow all of me at Your feet.
I worship You alone.
You have given me more than I
Could ever have wanted and I
Want to give You my heart and my soul.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You alone are Father, and
You alone are good,
You alone are Savior,
You alone are God.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: I'm alive. I'm alive. I'm alive. I'm alive. (4X)
